attributes.action: The Government should refund schools for exam board fees for this academic year
attributes.additional_details: Calling on the Government to reimburse schools for exam board fees for this academic year
attributes.background:
Schools are doing the bulk of the work to decide this year’s grades following the decision to scrap exams.
Therefore examination boards should refund the fees charged for A-level and GCSE entries this summer.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Refunds would be a matter for the exam boards.

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to compensate schools for exam fees paid this year, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
